p: In last two decades, EOs have given away exceptional protection against foodborne fungi and their associated mycotoxins and successfully substituted the usage of synthetic fungicides offering safer and eco-friendly tactic. Now, EO based bio-preservatives i.e. Sporan™, Promax™, ‘DMC Base Natural’, EcoPCOR, and EcoTrol are listed under GRAS by FDA and commercially available [ 62]. Therefore, in our study, an attempt was made to control the fungal growth and OTA content in food using EOs of C. zeylanicum, C. longa, O. basilicum, Z. officinale, and C. martini for the reason that these were eco-friendly and safer and attained the status of GRAS from FDA.
